message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $18000. This is a great deal, considering its true value to me is at least $15000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $18000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $15000 for it. Can you consider my offer?

Hi Bob, I understand that $18000 might be a stretch for you, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer you the product for $16500. This is a great compromise, considering its true value to me is at least $15000. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $16500 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $14000 for the product. Can you consider my offer?

Hi Bob, I understand that $14000 is still a bit lower than my target price, but I'm willing to make another concession. I can offer you the product for $16000. This is as low as I'm willing to go, considering its true value to me is at least $15000. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $16000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $13500 for the product. Can you consider my offer?
